DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_Scam_03_01: Hey, buddy! Come here for a second.
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_Scam_03_03: About the business of your life, buddy!
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_Scam_03_04: You give me 75 coins, and you will get some gold! Simple, right?
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_YouFucker_15_02: No one will fall for such a miserable scam!
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_YouFucker_03_04: You insulted me, so no exchange for you!
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_MarvinIdiot_03_02: That's the kind of business I understand. Here's your... gold.
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_MarvinIdiot_15_03: Wait a minute... What is that? These are not coins.
DIA_ScamPirate_NS58_MarvinIdiot_03_04: Ha! Gold like gold... Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go.
